duties_responsibilities.duty: Support the veterinary team in providing excellent care to patients
Demonstrate strong communication and organizational skills, multitasking, and handling stressful situations
Physical requirements include lifting and carrying up to 40 lbs, kneeling, bending, and using a step ladder to stock inventory

education_certification.credential: Credentialed or Non-Credentialed Veterinary Technician with 2+ years of clinical experience
